import re
p = input().strip()
range_check = bool(re.match(r'^[1-9][0-9]{5}$',p))
repeat_check = len(re.findall(r'(?=([0-9])[0-9]\1)',p))
print((range_check == True and repeat_check<2))

import re

num = input()
print(bool(re.match(r'^[1-9][\d]{5}$', num) and len(re.findall(r'(\d)(?=\d\1)', num))<2 ))
